newsitem.title: HUNGARY: HUNGARY NOON RADIO HEADLINES - JULY 15.
newsitem.headline: HUNGARY NOON RADIO HEADLINES - JULY 15.

text.p: These are the main headlines on Hungary's Kossuth Radio midday news. Reuters cannot vouch for their accuracy:
- Parliament has passed unanimously a motion on NATO accession talks.
- Parliament will be able to pass the pension reform bill as opposition party MDF renounced earlier plans to refer it to the constitutional court.
- The caucus of opposition Christian Democrat Party (KDNP) will not be tied by the party's decisions in the future, after today's statute amendment.
- Police has found a sub-machine gun stolen last year from a Budapest polioce station.
- Parliament has called Hungarians to help flood-stricken Poland and and Czech Republic.
